R

receive() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.client.network.ClientBG
This method will be active for the entire duration of the game and when a message arrives (if it's not a ping) the receive cast it to a ServerMessage and then puts the message in the messageBox, that is an ArrayList of message placed in the ClientManager class.
receive() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.network.ClientListener
Method that receives messages and if it is not a PingMessage, the receive method handles the message and returns it or puts it in the stackMessages ArrayList.
RegisterClientListener - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.network
This class implements Runnable and it put new players in a match(gameSession), it is also used for the removal of a ended gameSession

run() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.client.network.ClientManager
Override of the run method, here the client manager creates the network handler(ClientBG), initializes the chosen interface and then handles events for the entire duration of the game, that events are the arrivals of messages from the server.
